item.title: Parsing a simple markdown style list in Ragel
item.author: patrick@rwx.io (Patrick Goddi)
item.description: In an earlier post Simple state machine example, I provided an example of using the Ruby state_machine gem to create a state machine for handling a simple list of tasks. In this post I will provide a similar but not exactly compatible description of building a parser to read lists from a text file. In this example I use the markdown syntax for lists, where items can be placed hierarchically, thus removing the need for a separate "
